mapper.select: select id , name , owner, startDate , endDate , cost , description from tbl_activity where id = #{id}
mapper.update: update tbl_activity set name=#{name} , owner=#{owner}, startDate=#{startDate} , endDate=#{endDate} , cost=#{cost}, description=#{description},editTime=#{editTime}, editBy=#{editBy} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select r.id as id,a.name,a.startDate,a.endDate,u.name as owner from tbl_activity a join tbl_user u on a.owner=u.id join tbl_clue_activity_relation r on a.id = r.activityId where r.clueId = #{id} order by a.startDate desc

select a.id,a.name,a.startDate,a.endDate,u.name as owner from tbl_activity a join tbl_user u on a.owner=u.id where a.name like '%' #{name} '%' and a.id not in (select activityId from tbl_clue_activity_relation where clueId = #{clueId}) order by a.startDate desc
